programme.title: El Clasico Legends: Andres Iniesta
programme.desc: Andres Iniesta. Andres Iniesta Luján. A normal person that was capable of the extraordinary. A glorious career which was also built, in part, on magical performances in ElClásico.

programme.title: El Clasico Moments: BAR v RMA 18/19

programme.title: El Clasico Legends: Ronaldinho
programme.desc: Ronaldinho. Ronaldinhos finest Clásico came on the 19th of November of 2005. Just one point separated both teams in the table, but the Brazilian proved that the gulf on the pitch was much greater.

programme.title: LaLiga 13/14: R Madrid v Barcelona
programme.desc: LaLiga Santander - Week 29: Real Madrid vs Barcelona. Barcelona beat Real Madrid 4-3 in a dramatic El Clásico, with Messi scoring a hat-trick to revive Barcas title hopes after Ramos was sent off.

programme.title: El Clasico Legends: Álvaro Arbeloa
programme.desc: Álvaro Arbeloa. Álvaro Arbeloa played a key role in Clásicos, where he was handed the unenviable task of defending the likes of Leo Messi, Neymar Jr, Alexis Sánchez or David Villa down his flank.

programme.title: El Clasico Moments: BAR v RMA 08/09
programme.desc: El Clasico Moments - Barcelona vs Real Madrid 2008/09. A celebration of footballs fiercest rivalry, El Clásico. From stunning goals to unforgettable drama, we revisit the clashes that defined generations and shaped legends.

programme.title: El Clasico Legends: Gareth Bale
programme.desc: Gareth Bale. Gareth Bale played in LaLiga 11 Clásicos and 15 in total. And despite his numbers against Barcelona not being spectacular, he did score a memorable goal in the 2014 Copa del Rey final.
